alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 2:42PM CST until February 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, brief snow and lowered visibility. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph leading to blowing snow and low visibility down to a quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Oneida, Vilas, Florence and Forest Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility on area roadways. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
